document_data.name: Hlaungadath
document_data.mainbody: '''Hlaungadath''' was a ruined city lying in the desert of northwestern [[Anauroch]]. Hlaungadath was the remnants of a formerly great city of [[Netheril]]. The city landed near the [[High Ice]] and was eventually abandoned,<ref>{{Cite web/Portals of Anauroch: The Lost Portal at Hlaungadath}} but the ruins remained largely intact.
document_data.Geography:
It was some 40 to 50 miles from either the [[Graypeak Mountains]] or [[Nether Mountains]].

Hlaungadath was the destination of a hidden portal in the [[Dangling Tower]] in [[Ched Nasad]].
document_data.Description: Hlaungadath's architecture was clearly [[Netherese]], with square column bases and pointed arched windows. The city was filled with ruined domes, colonnades, ramparts, and towers.
document_data.Inhabitants: The ruins of the city were inhabited by [[lamia]]s with their thralls: [[manticore]]s, [[asabi]], and [[gargoyle]]s.
document_data.Notable Locations: * Ruins of the High Hall of Justice: On the facade there was still text in [[Netherese language|Netherese]] meaning "In Truth's Light No Lies Abide."
